title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception and plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: Schindler's List
description: The story of Oskar Schindler, who saved over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

title: Titanic
description: A romantic drama set against the backdrop of the tragic sinking of the Titanic.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A slow-witted but kind-hearted man witnesses and unwittingly influences historical events in the 20th century.

title: Room
description: A young boy experiences the outside world for the first time after being held captive with his mother.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The story of John Nash, a brilliant mathematician who battles schizophrenia.

title: Birdman
description: An actor famous for portraying a superhero tries to reclaim his career with a Broadway play.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Interstellar
description: Astronauts travel through a wormhole to save humanity.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic tale of love and misunderstandings in 19th-century England.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends try to party before graduation.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over decades.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrant.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the shocking truth about his reality and joins a rebellion against machines enslaving humanity.

title: Alien
description: The crew of a spaceship encounters a deadly extraterrestrial creature while investigating a mysterious transmission.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: A young farm boy joins a rebel alliance to save the galaxy from an oppressive empire.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager accidentally travels back in time and must ensure his parents fall in love to save his future.

title: The Exorcist
description: A young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, and her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A blacksmith teams up with an eccentric pirate to save the governor's daughter from undead pirates.

title: The Goonies
description: A group of kids discover a treasure map and embark on a quest to find the long-lost pirate treasure.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: An archaeologist goes on a quest to find the biblical Ark of the Covenant.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare when the creatures escape.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
description: A recently divorced man seeks to rediscover his masculinity with the help of a bachelor expert.

title: La La Land
description: A musician and an actress struggle to pursue their dreams while facing the challenges of love in Los Angeles.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: A cursed young woman seeks help from a mysterious wizard and his magical moving castle.

title: The Proposal
description: A strict boss is forced to fake an engagement with her assistant to avoid deportation.

title: The Notebook
description: An epic love story between a wealthy young woman and a humble worker.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit embarks on a dangerous quest to destroy a magical ring.

title: Love and Other Drugs
description: A pharmaceutical sales rep and a young woman with Parkinson's disease begin a relationship that will challenge their lives and their views on love.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance against those who wronged him, taking on an army of enemies in a relentless pursuit.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the 23rd century, a cab driver becomes involved with a mysterious woman who is the key to saving the world from an ancient evil force.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a mental institution on an isolated island, uncovering disturbing truths.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but insane cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer on the loose.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: A woman in New York City believes she has witnessed a crime while spying on her neighbors, but no one believes her.

title: Insidious
description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

title: The Shining
description: A writer and his family become haunted by supernatural forces while staying at a remote hotel during the winter season.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a world of spirits and gods and must find a way to rescue her parents and return to the real world.

title: Scary Movie
description: A parody of popular horror films, following a group of friends who find themselves caught up in a series of bizarre and terrifying events.

title: Scarface
description: A Cuban immigrant rises to power in the Miami drug trade, becoming a ruthless kingpin in the world of crime.
